pages.text: $(li)Game Controller, board blocks and ships are now wither immune.$(li)Game Controller blast resistance is now much higher.$(li)Added info pages for deployables.$(li)Added $(l:naval_warfare:game_requirements/replaying_battles/battle_log)battlelog system./$$(li)Minor / Major Insight and Heatseaker abilities will now target a random part of their selected ship instead of the base part.

$(li)Whirlpool now also shows the affected tiles in chat like other multi-target abilities (salvo's, mortars, etc.)$(li)Crouching while using the Game Interactor or Spell Wand will now make the tool cycle to the previous mode / spell.$(li)Changed ship destruction code to fix a few issues. This now also makes it so ships only remove the parts that below to themselves instead of all connecting blocks with the same registry name.

$(li)New model for $(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/submarines/submarine)Submarine/$$(li)New textures for ship items and deployable ship items.$(li)Fixed bug that caused on-hit passives to not show a popup item when hit by a torpedo.
